channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Bluetooth Speaker Is $20 Off
item.description: Finish summer strong with a discount on the JBL Flip 7.

item.title: The Instagram iPad App Is Finally Here
item.description: Now you can doomscroll on a bigger screen.

item.title: Apple’s Siri upgrade could reportedly be powered by Google Gemini
item.description: An AI Siri is in the works and it could be running Gemini under the hood.

item.title: xAI’s CFO is the latest executive to leave Elon Musk’s AI firm
item.description: While at xAI, Mike Liberatore helped orchestrate the company's $5 billion debt raise, alongside another $5 billion in equity — almost half of which ca...

item.title: How 'Hollow Knight: Silksong' Fans Turned Waiting for Its Release Into a Game
item.description: Since 2019, fans have eagerly awaited Team Cherry’s next game, which is out this week. In the meantime, they got creative.

item.title: CoreWeave acquires agent-training startup OpenPipe
item.description: CoreWeave hopes the YC-backed startup will help it expand up the stack and cash in on enterprises developing AI agents.

item.title: FirstClub bucks India’s speed obsession, quickly triples valuation to $120M with premium approach
item.description: FirstClub has raised $23 million in a Series A round co-led by Accel and RTP Global to expand its premium quick commerce platform.

item.title: This Robot Only Needs a Single AI Model to Master Humanlike Movements
item.description: Atlas, Boston Dynamics’ dancing humanoid, can now use a single model for walking and grasping—a significant step toward general-purpose robot algorith...

item.title: Scale AI is suing a former employee and rival Mercor, alleging they tried to steal its biggest customers
item.description: Scale is clearly concerned enough about the threat of Mercor, and the poaching of one of its employees, to pursue legal action

item.title: Automated Sextortion Spyware Takes Webcam Pics of Victims Watching Porn
item.description: A new specimen of “infostealer” malware offers a disturbing feature: It monitors a target's browser for NSFW content, then takes simultaneous screensh...
